Title: Relates to the authority and responsibility of the chairman of the metropolitan transportation authority; repealer
Summary: Relates to the authority and responsibility of the chairman of the metropolitan transportation authority.
LawCode: Amd §1263, rpld §1263 sub 4 ¶(d), Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the authority and responsibility of the chairman of the metropolitan transportation authority; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
